## Practice

1. Solve the following systems of equations using the method from Example 1.

   1. $$
      3x_1 - 5x_2 = 7 \\
      x_1 + 9x_2 = 11
      $$

   2. $$
      3x_1 + 2x_2 - x_3 = 8 \\
      2x_1 - 5x_2 + x_3 = 3 \\
      6x_1 + x_3 = 2
      $$

2. Solve the systems simultaneously using the method from Example 2.

   $$
   3x_1 + 2x_2 - x_3 = b_1 \\
   2x_1 - 5x_2 + x_3 = b_2 \\
   6x_1 + x_3 = b_3
   $$

   1. For $b_1 = 2$, $b_2 = 6$, $b_3 = 8$
   2. For $b_1 = -2$, $b_2 = -6$, $b_3 = -8$
